nodes.text: Malkite poisoner gear was a type of kit used by the Malkite poisoners, a secret order of assassins. Following the death of Imperial Admiral Jyrom Ottdell as a result of zolall extract, Imperial Security Bureau Agent Andressa Divo ordered two dozen "Malkite poisoner kits" from dark corners of the HoloNet as she investigated the Malkite poisoners. While the majority were fake, one kit was legitimate, containing an ampule of rare zolall poison with a threat to Agent Divo warning her to halt her investigation inscribed on the dosage label.
